info.name: Spring AI Demo
info.description: Complete API collection for Spring AI demonstration including Chat, Image Generation, Horoscope, and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) endpoints

item.name: Chat & Image

request.description: Send a basic chat prompt to the AI model. Uses default GPT-4 model and temperature settings from application.properties.

url.raw: http://localhost:8080/api/image/gen?message=A serene landscape with mountains at sunset

query.value: A serene landscape with mountains at sunset

request.description: Generate an image using DALL-E 3 based on a text description. Returns the URL of the generated 1024x1024 image.

Generate a personalized horoscope prediction. Demonstrates prompt templates with variable substitution. Valid zodiac signs: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, Pisces.

item.description: Basic chat, image generation, and horoscope endpoints demonstrating Spring AI fundamentals

item.name: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)

request.description: Check the current status of the RAG document store. Returns the total number of chunks and whether the system is ready.

Ingest a PDF document into the RAG system. The document will be:
1. Extracted (PDF to text)
2. Split into chunks (1000 chars with 200 char overlap)
3. Embedded using OpenAI text-embedding-3-small
4. Stored in the in-memory vector database

Note: Limited to 50 chunks for demo purposes. Update the filePath to point to your PDF.

Ask questions about ingested documents using RAG. The system will:
1. Convert your question to an embedding
2. Find the most similar document chunks (topK)
3. Include those chunks as context in the prompt
4. Generate an answer grounded in the retrieved content

topK: Number of most relevant chunks to retrieve (default: 3)
Search for document chunks most similar to a query. Returns the matching chunks with metadata (source, chunk_index, preview). Useful for debugging or showing users what context would be retrieved.
Clear all documents from the RAG vector store. Use this to reset the system before ingesting new documents.

item.description: RAG endpoints demonstrating document ingestion, embedding, semantic search, and context-grounded question answering
